summary: Made significant progress on Beauty Booking module implementation. Completed Phase 2 (Admin Web) and Phase 3 (Vendor Web) core features: (1) Admin: Enhanced dashboard with 10+ KPIs and revenue charts, complete CRUD views for bookings, packages, gift cards, retail, loyalty, subscriptions, comprehensive sidebar navigation. (2) Vendor: Created complete sidebar with badge/subscription indicators, enhanced dashboard with booking stats and revenue trends, booking management with detail view and actions (confirm/cancel/complete), enhanced calendar with FullCalendar.js drag-and-drop functionality, subscription views exist. Remaining: Vendor package/gift card/retail/loyalty/finance/badge views, Customer pages (search, salon detail, booking wizard, dashboard), API extensions, Flutter integration, Testing, Documentation.
current_status: Phase 2 (Admin Web) ~90% complete. Phase 3 (Vendor Web) ~70% complete - core booking/calendar/dashboard done, subscription exists, need remaining management views. Phase 4 (Customer Web), Phase 5 (API), Phase 6 (Flutter), Phase 7 (Testing) still pending. Total progress: ~40% of overall implementation.
